Practice_Description: Limit system access to authorized users.
Limit system access to authorized functions.
Control access to CUI based on need-to-know.
Employ least privilege for all users.
Restrict non-privileged users from admin tasks.
Monitor and protect against unauthorized use.
Use secure methods for remote access.
Verify and limit external system connections.
Retain audit logs based on policy.
Use monitoring tools to detect attacks.
